title: T204 TTT Wagner SGC 40 for sale or trade

posts.post_title: T204 TTT Wagner SGC 40 for sale or trade
posts.post_content:
T204 TTT Heinie Wagner, Boston Red Sox SGC 40 will sell for $750 delivered or would trade for a TTT back that I don't have. I also have other TTT's for trade only for ones I don't have, please let me know who you might have.

Scott
